title: 11/29: Start or Sit (NFC); Thanksgiving Recaps (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Drew Brees was the worst Thanskgiving Fantasy QB, Kenny Golladay was awesome and Josh Allen thrived in another tough matchup. We'll get to them, but first let's talk about some tricky backfields! Are we starting the ARI or SEA RBs this week (2:06)? We also dish on the LAR defense (4:31) and update our Deshaun Watson rankings (7:45) ... Recapping CHI-DET (11:10), BUF-DAL (16:50) and NO-ATL (21:14). Our thoughts on David Montgomery, Dak Prescott, Jared Cook and many, many more. Then we've got news and notes (26:40) and Beat the Waiver Wire (29:05) ... LAC-DEN (34:40), CLE-PIT (42:48), MIN-SEA (51:48), GB-NYG (58:16), LAR-ARI (1:04:52), WAS-CAR (1:08:50) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Recapping the Thanksgiving games and previewing LAC-DEN, CLE-PIT and the four NFC home games. Thoughts on the ARI and SEA backfields, Jared Goff, Phillip Lindsay, Jamaal Williams and many more.
